ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Linda Ann Loo ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. LINDA ANN LOO, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective September 30, 2018.
